amendatorysection.para: The board may certify for registration without examination any applicant who is legally registered as a professional landscape architect in any other state or country whose requirements for registration are at least substantially equivalent to or higher than requirements of the provisions of sections 81-8,184 to 81-8,208 and which extends the same privileges of reciprocity to landscape architects registered in this state and who has actively practiced for at least one of the three years immediately preceding the application for registration without examination. The application for reciprocal registration shall be accompanied by a fee in an amount the board shall determine.
